title: Alister Jack – 2020 Comments on St. Andrew’s Day
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Alister Jack, the Secretary of State for Scotland, on 30 November 2020.
content:
St Andrew’s Day is a chance for us to celebrate all that is great about Scotland, and Scots, and to reflect on what it means to be Scottish.
